mapper.insert: INSERT INTO vm( cpu, memory, description, status, create_date ) VALUES( #{cpu}, #{memory}, #{description}, "stopped", DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), "%Y-%m-%d") )
mapper.select: SELECT mac_address, cpu, memory, description, status, create_date, delete_date FROM vm WHERE mac_address = ${macAddress}
mapper.update:
UPDATE vm
cpu = #{cpu},
memory = #{memory},
description = #{description},
WHERE mac_address = ${macAddress}
UPDATE vm SET status = "deleted", delete_date = NOW() WHERE mac_address = ${macAddress}
